website_summaries.verdict: A durable, military-grade laptop that takes some bumps and drops in stride and features a full-sized keyboard and trackpad.
pros: Provides a super-fast WiFi connection that makes streaming and downloading files a breeze
Features multiple levels of built-in virus protection
Battery runs for up to 12 hours
Loaded with voice-activated Google Assistant and other Google apps
cons: Some users feel the screen has a strange yellow tint, so white doesn’t show up true

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy and disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked the first day for 15 min. We charged it over night. It now turns on for 1 sec. and then turns off immediately! I am so upset. This was a gift for my son so that he could do schoolwork on it. What a waste of money. I am trying to return it and there is no way to do it
customer_reviews.author: Sebee

customer_reviews.title: Good little laptop.
customer_reviews.text: People are complaining about the screen, so I expected it to be so much worse than it actually is. For a laptop at this price point the screen is more than satisfactory. Easy to setup and use. My six year old twins are doing great on the two I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and distance learning
customer_reviews.text: I have a ten year old In 4th who is using this for distance learning this year. This is our family’s first experience with a Chromebook and we think it’s great. It’s a great value for the money and perfect for an elementary school student who just needs basic internet, zoom, etc. I was worried about screen quality after reading the reviews but it’s totally fine - don’t expect the quality of an ipad, smartphone, or tv, but it is far from terrible. I’ve sat next to him during lessons and it’s fine from my diagonal view as well.
customer_reviews.author: EMB

customer_reviews.title: I hate tech stuff and really have nothing to compare it to.
customer_reviews.text: Computers are soooo worthless; screen is pathetic; the picture has poor reception in some light; keyboard is a miserable thing to type on; sound quality is poor as in can't hear a damn thing, even at full volume, unless in absolute silence. (thank heavens for closed captioning) It was purchased for what ended up as a one time event...it's going to make a nice gift, as I will be passing it on to a family member.
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: Functional for my kindergartner
customer_reviews.text: The screen and camera are poor but it is a functional piece for a student, young student
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Valadez

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I was really happy upon receiving this. I was not very computer friendly, and this is stupid easy to navigate. I am going to college after being out of high school 22 years, and this is making it really easy for me. Everything is in my chromebook and easy to access. It came well packaged, brand new, no problems. The only thing that bugs me is there is no numerical pad on the side like on desktop, but considering its size, I get it. The screen also could be clearer. I definitely wouldn't recommend rhis for shopping online, but for schoolwork that I need to get done, it's fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: erin blair

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for your basic tasks
customer_reviews.text: I need a basic computer for writing papers and going online. It needed to do nothing fancy so this works great. I am majorily computer illeterate and had no issues navigating this. It holds a good charge too.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Bosse

customer_reviews.title: value laptop
customer_reviews.text: It does the job for basic needs. Great computer for kids and teens. Amazon actually had the best price for this laptop
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K

customer_reviews.title: Not Recomended
customer_reviews.text: Everything good with the product the first month. I bought it on August 6 2020. Then it just not working on Oct 6, 2020 It went off working with it and does not turn on. The battery was full. I purchased th asurion insurance for 45.99 that says its all covered for 2 years and they say I have to use the manufacturer guarantee. Here in PR there is no samsung store that gives service to chromebooks. Only 2 months of use and its not working. Waste of money. I called customer service "amazon" and they can't offer a resolution for this, only to call the asurion plan. Real bad experience. NOT RECOMMENDED.
customer_reviews.author: D Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: lost in shipping, replaced quickly
customer_reviews.text: The original computer was lost in shipping. Amazon had us wait a few more days but then replaced the item quickly. So far, very satisfied. this is the right purchase for my 4th grader
customer_reviews.author: Msteryhell

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with this laptop. My grandson uses it for virtual school and it is perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop because it was cheap and I didn't know how bad Chrome OS was. There is almost nothing I can do but web surfing. Nothing's compatible.. Don't use Google products. You become a tester.
customer_reviews.author: Will B

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money, Very Poor Quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: bought 3 of these for distance learning, within 2 days 1 screen died and was not usable, within 3 weeks wall charger stopped working on a different one. Very poor quality from Samsung seems to be the new normal, would not buy or recommend to anyone that they do buy, Leveno Dell and HP are better bet for the money
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: It allllllllllll good thanks 😊😊😀
customer_reviews.text: Thank you very much 😊 I'm very happy with this laptop I liked it so much I ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: William moore

customer_reviews.title: Great chromebook
customer_reviews.text: Great device. Works well and does everything a chrome book should.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Miller

customer_reviews.title: Delivered on time.
customer_reviews.text: Product is a wonderful help in our household. Delivery was on time and very much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Mears

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece. Just like the way I want it.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin N Nsoh

customer_reviews.title: Poor screen quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 6 GB ram model directly from Samsung. If the screen was better this would be five stars. Good build quality and the little details seemed to be well done. The screen though makes this useless. The screen is highly directional. Slight movement causes the screen to change brightnesss level to such a degree that it results in eye strain. This happened with just the slight movement from resting it on my lap and trying to work on it. Even when viewed from the best angle the text appears fuzzy and shadowed. The screen quality is unfortunate since this would be a fantastic unit otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: B. S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Chromebook with good keyboard, touchpad, and great battery life. The display is not as good as those laptops costing 2 to 4 times as much but it is fine for daily use and I don't find it be a problem even when using it for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: BB_2800

customer_reviews.title: Great Internet machine
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my wife. It is perfect for her to surf the Internet and check email quickly. As others have said, the screen could be better. The screen is not good when viewed at from an angle. But then, it's an inexpensive item. It's the first Chromebook I've ever purchased. The speed is great. It boots almost instantly. It has great battery life. It is very light. The keyboard is responsive. It has to USB 3.0 ports and bluetooth. I connected an inexpensive bluetooth mouse to the system without a problem. My wife could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Listen, this is a sub $300 Chromebook— they had to cut costs somewhere. Is the TN panel great? No. But this laptop cost me $302 with tax, has 6gb of RAM and 64gb of storage, will be updated at least until 2026, also does what I need it to do (homework/writing). I have the Samsung Chrome book 3 too, and the 4 is a nice upgrade. This is a light laptop with a small footprint. so I can easily carry it back and forth to campus. Also, the new design is freaking sexy. Probably my favorite laptop of all time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: We had to get 2 of these for our girls starting backvto school. They only gave us 2 weeks notice before school that they would need a chromebook. They even arrived 4 days before they were expected. They were brand new and easy to setup.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Alt key defect, bad quality management!
customer_reviews.text: My alt key is oblique ,it mean left side is higher than righ side, just alt key , do I need upload photo? Maybe it can help you understand the defect , “Alt key is oblique,left side is higher! your Quality management is bad!” Btw ,chrome os can’t install some apk data ,not like normal Android os, it need additional step (turn on chrome os developer mode to install apps from sources other than the play store)
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent laptop for under $300
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this based on the fact that this cost $234. I see many reviews here complaining about the screen. Remember what you have purchased. This laptop is fast, light and well made. There is even a good amount of storage for a personal computer. Yes, the screen is not as vivid as a $1000 computer, if that is very important to you, buy a more expensive laptop. For those who need to use email, browse the web, stream etc. you can not go wrong with this. There is one USB port and one USB C port. There are inexpensive attachments if you need hdmi or more ports. I highly recommend this chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: For the money I don't think you can beat it. I saw where folks were recommending getting 6gb ram and I'm glad I did. Pro's: Great little Chromebook. Quick. Con's: Display could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: The best budget Chromebook on the market!!
customer_reviews.text: This Chromebook is lightening fast ... very responsive with no lag. I've had 30+ tabs open with no loss of performance. Others have mentioned the screen was an issue for them but I think the display is fantastic. I typically don't need to adjust the viewing angle unless I'm constantly moving around, but that's a user issue not a hardware one. I can't recommend this Chromebook highly enough! Go on ahead and buy it. You'll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Exlibris

customer_reviews.title: The screen on this Chromebook is useless.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something sample, the size is perfect and it looks good but the screen is useless on this one.
customer_reviews.author: leticia rivera

customer_reviews.title: functional chromebook
customer_reviews.text: a chromebook is a chromebook, somewhat. that said, what will stand out is the negatives: the screen is not the best...it's a little dull. the speakers are not the best...they're a little soft. but, the big problem was the price: i guess there was a big demand for chromebooks during lockdown, so the shysters raised the price on me. i bought it anyway. it was more than twice as much as my old ACER chromebook. all that said i'd probably get it again but look for a better deal. whatever....it's all going to get swallowed by the sun anyway \m/
customer_reviews.author: jeffbezosisbald

customer_reviews.title: I’m done
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if I received this broken or what, but I took it out of the box and set it up for my husband and it wouldn’t turn on, or do anything. So that was $200 down the drain. Now it’s a play computer for my year old son....
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Coover

customer_reviews.title: small, what I need, always ready
customer_reviews.text: this is a super convenient do-just-about-everything-personal-related computer. I don't need real spreadsheets or non Google stuff to make my personal life work, so this small machine is great. Super good price, plug&play and so easy to manage. Long battery too. Love it for my personal life.
customer_reviews.author: Eos

customer_reviews.title: Poor Screen Quality, Lacks Normal Features
customer_reviews.text: Good RAM and performance. The screen is worse than many 10+ year old laptops, doesn't seem to be HD or just barely. Missing common features such as a touch screen or a backlit keyboard. Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B.

customer_reviews.title: Chrome 4 Notebook real review
customer_reviews.text: I am used to windows. I have always worked with android vs apple and found it difficult to upload all my desired apps. I had problems with OS reading my page while streaming Netflix and Prime. Message error every 20 minutes. It's a very basic notebook with only 1 port. Ok for young students.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Good, except for the screen. Screen is garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Decent entry-level Chromebook. The keyboard is decent and the processor and RAM make it quick. The body is sturdy and could probably survive a drop. However, the screen is probably on of the worst screens I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Cangaceiro11

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Its slim and light weight. I like everything about it but the graphics. The clarity is terrible
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Screen is absolute garbage
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these for the kids to use. The screens are absolutely horrible. Also NOT touchscreen despite misleading description. They make them borderline unusable. I also ordered acer Chromebook R11 and an acer spin 311. Both screens are so much better at basically the same price point, with similar build quality and features. DO NOT BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Nasca

customer_reviews.title: Power cord died in less than two months.
customer_reviews.text: Power cord died in less than two months. I haven't been able to use the chromebook much because I have been working a lot, so there is absolutely no reason the cord should have died already. I refuse to give it a higher review because this is ridiculous and I believe speaks volumes for the poor quality this company is fine with producing and selling.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Not what advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Product is not what was advertised or described. This is not a touchscreen chrome book. Overpriced for what I received. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Barton

customer_reviews.title: Great, light machine in its price range
customer_reviews.text: Although the screen is nothing to write home about, the machine is well-built, has a sturdy feel, and is very lightweight. With 6GB of RAM everything works quickly and smoothly, and you could have more than a dozen tabs open without a slowdown. The machine will also get automatic security OS updates from Google until June of 2026. Overall, I would highly recommend this Chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: Dester

customer_reviews.title: The screen...is really bad!
customer_reviews.text: Got the 6GB version. The screen stood out as VERY directional and looks washed out if you're at any angle that's not perfectly perpendicular to the screen. If you have a Kindle fire HD, this screen will be a downgrade. Was going to use this for digital learning but didn't want to risk destroying the kiddo's vision with this terrible screen. Had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: Bummed!
customer_reviews.text: NOT A TOUCH SCREEN AS ADVERTISED! I will be returning for that reason. The quality is decent and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Tawny A.

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: A fairly good travel and casual use machine for the money. Battery life is noting like the advertisement, I have not seen over six hours at best.
customer_reviews.author: LK Duck

customer_reviews.title: Brownie Points... Great Gift!!
customer_reviews.text: Being online and in bed at the same time is now comfortable because my chrome book is so lightweight. I find the battery life impressive. A few days old now and haven’t had to recharge yet. My husband earned major brownie points when he bought me this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha LeJune

customer_reviews.title: Love the long battery life!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Love the long battery life! That's why I got it. Would have gotten five stars if it had CD capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Tali

customer_reviews.title: Backup laptop for teaching online support.
customer_reviews.text: Great little laptop! Functional with no frills, 6gb ram helps it along a bit. I bet it outlast my surface book by several years! (I actually love the Surface books - but didn't want to shell out that kinda money for a backup machine). As long as you have reasonable expectations it's GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: pm

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel
customer_reviews.text: I really got into touch screen because most small tablets have poor feeling keys and a so so mouse pad. This tablet has a great feeling keyboard allowing easy touch tryping. The mouse pad also is nice to use so I find myself not touching the screen as often. So far I really like this tablet. Plenty of USB sockets allow use of accessories and of course the Chrome operating system keeps me secure. Latest computer allows download of Android apps.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Nice chromebook
customer_reviews.text: I am unable to get good access to my yahoo email account. This is frustrating and unexpected, but all other features are great. I would recommend this chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: BorntoBargain

customer_reviews.title: Good Chromebook, mediocre display
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these for homeschooling. The displays, as other reviews have said, are the worst thing about them. Wouldn't want to sit in front of one all day, but that's not how we use them. For having our kids do their Time4Learning lessons, they're fine. At this price point we've been very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: An amazing product. The only thing I didn't really like about the chrome book is the screen is a little dark
customer_reviews.author: chad davis

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for my kids. worked great for 4 months for school. One of the two stopped charging one day. Factory reset did not work. it is not the charger as both chargers charge my other identical chromebook. Buyer beware. lasts just past the 90 day return window and then died. Wonder how long the other one would last for?
customer_reviews.author: Jason Tsang

customer_reviews.title: Best Chromebook I have Owned
customer_reviews.text: I have owned 2 prior Chromebooks. This is by far the best - faster speed, better screen, better sound and feels more solid. This forth generation model is better in every way over my previous third generation model.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy This it sucks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brand new not even a whole yr ago and already the charging port and the there is NO HDMI slot also it’s telling my My Chrome system is corrupted somehow and I have to HARD RESET mind You I bought a Refurbished Chromebook from Wish more than 2 yrs ago and it still works great a lil age but perfect so DONT BUY THIS also Screen has no grip so it will flop freely with movement
customer_reviews.author: damien

customer_reviews.title: Can't send picture all wrapped up sorry.
customer_reviews.text: I Out side it is spotless I cant tell you anything about inside. Have small problems until yesterday today I have had iti am done .between the computer and my brother passing away and my cancer(Vietnam veteran) thangs for your text.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph j.

customer_reviews.title: Good battery life but trackpad and power buttons not sensitive
customer_reviews.text: I only charged it for 3h when I first received it, and it had lasted for around 11h! The trackpad is not sensitive, so I will recommend users to use mouse instead. power on/off button is not sensitive as well. Better to keep it locked and hibernated instead.
customer_reviews.author: Yohana T.

customer_reviews.title: I want the laptop to be replace
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laptop in June 2020 and the laptop stopped working. November 2020
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Google is my best friend
customer_reviews.text: Love! Love! Love! It’s very easy to use. And we use ours all the time so far so good !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought his recently for distance learning and has not been working out too well. Zoom sessions are gargled no matter where we have connected the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: pamela

customer_reviews.title: Basic
customer_reviews.text: Speaker volume is weak, but I’m in a house full of kids all day so maybe that’s user error. It does a fine job.
customer_reviews.author: Shouldbe

customer_reviews.title: Not as good a the chrombook 3
customer_reviews.text: The previous version was stronger, I'm no longer going to be loyal to this line of chromebooks
customer_reviews.author: Michael Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: Love our laptop
customer_reviews.text: My kids use this laptop for school and they love it!! Very reliable and efficient!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Y Morris

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality could be better
customer_reviews.text: Great Chromebook good storage nice. Size and can't beat the price just wish the screen picture quality was clearer and brighter
customer_reviews.author: Tomoc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the product
customer_reviews.text: Can not get a better deal for a Chromebook with 6gb memory 64gb storage for the price I paid
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I love this laptop so far! It came packaged well and in a day! Needed something that would last but also didn’t cost too much since we already have two MacBooks. Definitely would recommend this to anyone looking.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Buy now!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. Came 2 weeks earlier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Redmond

customer_reviews.title: Super fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: I was told the earliest arrival would be the 19th, regular expected delivery 21st-26th, but it arrived the 15th....JUST IN TIME FOR THE 1st day of high school for my little freshman
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Westmoreland

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I replace an older Chromebook, was able to access data on the new on after login into account.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: New computer
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVED this product it's fantastic. I'm so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Mosckvan

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product.. take the screen reviews with a grain of salt.. your buying a chromebook not a gaming lap.. purchased the 6gb version and have had no issues.. it functions perfectly for its intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: samsung chrome
customer_reviews.text: it is convenient but i do not understand that I can not - sometimes - connect to Wifi - It said "out of range"
customer_reviews.author: Dinh Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the price. I use it for travel and use a PixelBook for home. As others have said the screen could be better. If the angle is right it is very usable but fades quickly if viewed from the sides. Linux apps run great (I use Moneydance and libreodfice). For Android apps you'll probably miss the fact that this model does not have a touchscreen and some Android games require it. I would have given 5 stars if the screen was better.
customer_reviews.author: Bob C

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: I had the last one and this one is awesome. Great deal for the money. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Pine

product_meta.title: Samsung Chromebook 4 Chrome OS 11.6" HD Intel Celeron Processor N4000 4GB RAM 64GB eMMC Gigabit Wi-Fi - XE310XBA-K02US
product_meta.description: The quality of Samsung Meets the accessibility of chrome OS. Its all-new light and compact design lets you stream, work, create, and play on a fast, secure device designed to take everywhere. You can download and save content and work with others using Google suite. Built with long-lasting battery and Gigabit Wi-Fi connectivity, The new Samsung Chromebook 4 brings speed and efficiency to any and every task or adventure.
feature_bullets: Advanced security with multiple layers of built-in virus protection

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars191 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
